text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: heh… heh… heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: hah～…hah… hah…

text_block_list.name: Other School Girl A
text_block_list.text: Huh…? Taishin-chan.

text_block_list.name: Other School Girl B
text_block_list.text: It's true, she is as small as ever～

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You guys.

text_block_list.name: Other School Girl A
text_block_list.text: Eh～, this uniform… so you enrolled in Tracen Academy .

text_block_list.name: Other School Girl B
text_block_list.text: Isn't it too tough for Taishin-chan? To run as a Horse Girl of Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Other School Girl B
text_block_list.text: Well, We're not even Horse Girls, but it looks like we can even win against Taishin-chan if we run!

text_block_list.name: Other School A
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, maybe we should enroll in Tracen Academy too.

text_block_list.name: Other School Girl A
text_block_list.text: Ugh～, that face is still the same as ever. Boring girl… let's go.

text_block_list.name: Other School Girl B
text_block_list.text: See ya～.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …Tch!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin, thanks for waiting! I bought the taiyaki, Ta-iy-a-ki!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh, what? Are you in a bad mood?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … Not really.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It was probably because Ticket took too much time to shop.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Because Taishin said “anything is fine”, so I had trouble deciding whether to buy crepes or ice cream or whatever, I was troubled～!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So, to make Taishin grow taller and bigger, I bought extra-large taiyaki!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wait, extra large…!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: If you can't eat it, we'll help you too, so it's okay! There's a place to sit over there, so let's eat there!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Come on, it's a waste if you don't eat it before it gets cold! Hurry up-Hurry up!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Geez… Let's go Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Alright, one more time!!
Few days before the “SatsukiShou”ー
Winning Ticket's training menu entered the chase stage, so today it was decided to run outside the school to do it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I still have enough strength! Let's do our best with the extra training, Trainer-san!
choice_data_list: Let's increase our energy until the actual performance!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Alright～～! My spirit is burning～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san and Winning Ticket-san. By any chance, are you going to train?
Yes, is there anything you need?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: The truth is, it seems that people are gathering in front of the school now.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: There are only a few days left until the “SatsukiShou”, it will be a problem if it interferes with training, so I thought I would pick you up.
Right now is the time to train even if it's a little. Well, if you can hold on to it, it's nothing to worry about.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, I'm going-I'm going! I can't refuse the people who support me or the people who came to interview me!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Huh? But, you said you were going to train…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It's okay! But I'm not planning to ditch my training. I'll follow through with what I've decided!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: With that said, I will do my best until curfew today! So Trainer-san, I will have you follow through with me until the end!
choice_data_list: All right, leave it to me
All right, leave it to me

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Well then, let's go to the interview!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Ahh, Winning Ticket-san!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! Can I interview you!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Woah, you don't need to force your way through, I will respond properly!
As the “SatsukiShou” approaches, Winning Ticket has also increased her degree of attention in the public.
However, she responded politely to the interview, whether it is her policy or not.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Winning Ticket-san! How is your training going?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Um… it's going great! I can see for myself that my condition is getting better day by day!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: About your 2 rivals running in the “SatsukiShou”, are you aware of their thoughts regarding the race?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's of course, that we are going to have fun! Not only in the “SatsukiShou” but also the Derby.
As Winning Ticket was surrounded by the staff and was answering. Just then, Narita Taishin came out of the school.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I see you're surrounded, aren't you…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, Taishin! Ehehe… after all, it's hard to refuse…

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Narita Taishin-san! About the first race of the classic frontー

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I have training to go to. See you later, Ticket.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eh… Yeah.
Narita Taishin after being asked by the reporter, left early

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: I was also avoided by Biwa Hayahide earlier.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Is that right…?
Both Narita Taishin and Biwa Hayahide want to focus on training in front of the upcoming “SatsukiShou”.
I was staring at the coverage of Winning Ticket while thinking about the training menu after this one so as not to lag behind.
Finally, the 3 girls of “BNW” gathered for the first time, the day of the classic first game the “SatsukiShou”.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaah～～! The classic race makes you nervous just by the sound～～!!
The classic race, which is limited to the Derby, is a prosperous one.
The classic race, which is limited to the Derby, is a prosperous one.
You've been training well and you're in a good physical condition. All that's left is to run with all your might and take on the glory!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin and Hayahide are also on the other side! So I will run with full force!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I will be going!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahh, Taishin!! Hayahide!! Hey～～～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Shut up! I told you before not to scream because it echoes!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'm just so happy that the 3 of us are going to run together!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I know how you feel. Each one of us ran though a number of races and are finally standing in the same place sharing the same feelings.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well… I guess the 3 of us are finally together.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But, running together is not the goal.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Run and win… I have done my best to that end. Today, for this day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm the same. I'm finally here. I'll run with all my might and win.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I won't lose either!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The first girl of BNW with high expectations, it is the number 1 in the popularity charts, Winning Ticket!
Responding to the cheers from the stands, Winning Ticket ran to the gate while waving her hand.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: All Horse Girl entered the gates! Classic round 1 race, the “SatsukiShou”… Now, it's the start!
